item.title: R DT data.table Join
item.description: This is part of PML notes. HDD: r_data_table_start Prepare Data # library(dplyr) library(readr) library(data.table) hero = " name, alignment, gender, publisher Magneto, bad, male, MarvelDuplicate Storm, good, female, MarvelDuplicate Batman, good, male, DC Joker, bad, male, DC Catwoman, bad, female, DC Hellboy, good, male, Dark Horse Comics " hero = read_csv(hero, trim_ws = TRUE, skip = 1) hero = data.table(hero) publisher = " publisher, yr_founded DC, 1934 MarvelDuplicate, 1939 MarvelDuplicate, 8888 Image, 1992 " publisher = read_csv(publisher, trim_ws = TRUE, skip = 1) publisher = data.
